vanilla.tip.config: All the client-side mods can be configured to your liking (e.g. enabling the "Sort" button in all inventories). If it can't be done in-game, edit the config file.
vanilla.tip.cooldown: Unlike my other modpacks, you unfortunately have to suffer with the combat cooldown until I can find a mod to balance axe damage.
vanilla.tip.mouse_tweaks: Remember that Mouse Tweaks is installed, so you can shift+click and drag the mouse to mass-move items (and more).
vanilla.tip.recipes: Due my addiction to Quality-of-Life features, there are plenty of alternate recipes avaliable. Be sure to check REI whenever you craft something.
vanilla.tip.rei: Flip through REI if you want to find the full list of mods. Some of them might add a feature or block you'd be interested in.
vanilla.tip.suggestions: As with all of my modpacks, you can make suggestions in the comments, on the GitHub, or in the Discord Server (same for reporting issues)
vanilla.tip.wits: If you find a structure, you can type /wits in chat to see which structure it is - just be sure you're standing inside it first.
